title: Testing For Covid-19
content:
treatment
if you have
risk factors
for severe illness. Treatment may be an option to make your symptoms less severe and shorten the time you are sick. Treatment needs to be started within a few days of when your symptoms begin.
If your COVID-19 test is negative
A negative COVID-19 test means the test did not detect the virus, but this
doesn't rule out that you could have an infection
. If you used an antigen test, follow
FDA recommendations for repeat testing
.
If you have symptoms:
